topics.body: Thinking on war a bit more and getting a bit philosophical here; if I had to summarize the human race the entire history of the human race is like a galaxy and the individual countries are like the stars that make up the galaxy; each individual star is created from dust coalescing together and originally there were no planets just supergiant stars each fighting for hydrogen getting bigger and bigger then exploding in the most violent of ways spraying the cosmos with more types of matter than just hydrogen and the ghosts of them formed the very center of the galaxy thus allowing the formation of the galaxy by everything revolving around them and the new stars forming from their dust and in turn themselves forming solar systems until they too burn up their fuel and either collapse in on themselves/dim into darkness or explode also thus allowing for future stars to be born.
